page.title: 15OUR SUNDAYS,BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: Mum gets up and prepares Sunday dinner and then goes to{church}for the 8am. service and leaves Michael and me in our beds.Around 10am.Mum comes back and Michael does his{home work}and I {play}with friends.At 1pm. Mum calls me for the{roast dinner,}after which we wash and dry up.Then Michael goes up stairs and I go back out to play.Mum pratices yoga.At 8 or 9pm I come in and watch TV and then go to bed.Mum and Mike go to bed about 1 hour later. {...}For our family a typical Sunday is as follows: my brother wakes me up at 7 and then we have breakfast of cornflakes. At 9.50 we leave for {church.}Church lasts till about 11.30 but we stay for coffee.We have{roast {dinner}at 1.30 and then I go out to play until 5.We go to{church again}at 6,return at 8 and go to bed at 9. My parents{watch TV}or sew until 11.
